title: The interaction of structured data using openEHR and large Language models for clinical decision support in prostate cancer
details: P Kaiser, S Yang, M Bach, C Breit, K Mertz, B Stieltjes… - World Journal of Urology, 2025
abstract: Abstract Background Multidisciplinary teams (MDTs) are essential for cancer care but are resource-intensive. Decision-making processes within MDTs, while critical, contribute to increased healthcare costs due to the need for specialist time and …
